rules_text:
When Whistling Blades enters, you may destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Recite {1}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this creature from your graveyard for its recite cost. If you do, exile it when it enters or if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Dead I am the sky, watching angels cry.”[/i]
